authors.name: Alexander Comerford
bio:
Hi! I'm a programmer / wannabe researcher living in Miami. I spend
most of my time coding, reading, or trying to solve math problems. Other
things I'm interested in are juggling, hebrew, and philosophy.
I love solving hard problems and blowing people's minds!
If you want to talk, reach out to me via

posts.title: Shape typing numpy with pyright and variadic generics
Setting up ipad screen mirroring on nixos
Hosting a browser shell with v86 and buildroot
Writing a Weaver solver
posts.excerpt: Beating word games one letter at a time

posts.title: Understanding KZG10 Polynomial Commitments
posts.excerpt: Sometimes the best knowledge is no knowledge

Recently
they decided that they wanted to schedule a weekly Saturday lunch together to
catch up on their lives and shoot the shit. They enjoy their discussions as
well as the food. Sometimes Alice chooses where to eat, sometimes Bob chooses,
and sometimes they just return to their favorite spots. Several weeks go by
and the constant debate they always revisit is where are they going to eat
